titles.title: 204 Now I Belong To Jesus (Awesome - Easy)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus my Lord
Will love me forever
From Him no power
Of evil can sever
He gave His life
To ransom my soul
Now I belong to Him

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Now I belong to Jesus
Jesus belongs to me
Not for the years
Of time alone
But for eternity

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Once I was lost
In sin's degradation
Jesus came down
To bring me salvation
Lifted me up
From sorrow and shame
Now I belong to Him

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Joy floods my soul
For Jesus has saved me
Freed me from sin
That long had enslaved me
His precious blood
He gave to redeem
Now I belong to Him
